about_the_game:
DEMO


Haunt Monster is game like Plants and Zombies. Play the demo, review the game and share it with your friends.

ADD TO WISHLIST



Haunt Monster Demo contanins: 2 maps, 3 objects and 4 weapons.
Haunt Monster Full Version contanins: 12 maps, 15 objects and 21 weapons + Online Co-op.

NOTE: Online Co-op is a free gift. If you get any bugs. Please don't give negative reviews. You can report bugs. Thank you.

STORY


Proxima Army: Eagle Lord is the owner of this army. The strength of the Proxima army is its ability to fight fast and strong.

Protostar Army: Lizard Lord is the owner of this army. The strength of the Protostar army is its technological intelligence.

HOW TO PLAY


Press WSAD to move the character. Press B to build. Press F to turn on the flash.

DESCRIPTION


Haunt Monster is a FPS Action Roguelike game in a random generated environment. Build, defend and survive waves of zombies, monsters and aliens. Play solo or co-op with a friend to survive.

BUILD

Make money, build bases to protect the army camp. Build machines such as: Assault Machine, Bomb Machine, Medical Machine. Buy weapons and defend against attacks from zombies, monsters and aliens.

DEFEND

Map defenses are random generated. Explore various randomly generated environmental infected areas: forest, desert, arctic. Cooperate with a friend and shoot various zombies, monsters and aliens.

SURVIOR

Protect, survive and buy new weapons to defend against attacks from zombies, monsters and aliens. Build more fences, traps, machines with a friend to strengthen your defense. The battle has begun and they are coming.

Features:
  • Play alone or co-op with a friend
  • Build machines to survive
  • Randomly generated environment
  • New zombies, monsters and aliens
  • +12 maps to explore
  • +15 objects to build defend
  • +21 weapons in the shop

name: Haunt Monster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Radeon HD 6790 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon HD 7950 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard

reviews:
“Haunt Monster is an FPS Action Roguelike game set in a dynamically generated environment”
7.0 – Gamesardor
short_description: Haunt Monster is a FPS Action Roguelike game in a random generated environment. Build, defend and survive waves of zombies, monsters and aliens. Play solo or co-op with a friend to survive.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
